title: Attendance shortage.
content: My attendance is pretty f*cked and I’ve a week of classes left. Including the medical certificate, which would js fetch me 10% more, I’m still lacking 85 in two subjects. I’m freaking out and basically very helpless. What do I do, I can’t afford to repeat the year⁉️⁉️

comments.body: Well apparently they won’t issue my admit card unless I have 85 and I still can’t make up 75 in one sub💀

theyll do all this drama but in the end they wont make you repeat if you have shortage. worst case theyll have extra classes which youll have to sit in to increase attendance but they wont withhold degree/ make you repeat and all
